attributes.action: Ask Her Majesty The Queen to award David Healy a Knighthood for his continued contribution to sport in Northern Ireland.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
David Healy was born on 5th August, 1979 in Killyleagh and is a professional footballer who (from the date of this petition) has scored a record of 33 international goals for Northern Ireland. 

David currently plays his club football for Fulham in the English Premier League.

David holds the record for scoring the most goals in a European qualifying campaign (2008), by beating the previous record of 12 goals which was held by Croatian striker Davor Šuker since 1996.  

David continues to work with and encourage young people from across all traditions in Northern Ireland by uniting them in sport. 

We the undersigned recommend that you ask Her Majesty The Queen to award David Healy a Knighthood for his continued contribution to sport in Northern Ireland.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
